ValidationRule.description: this is for pipeline validation, and will check if the aXcessa opportunity has data entered in the Opportunity Products field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Contract_Date_Sent__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "axcessa", OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Sent"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Received") ), OR( ISBLANK( Opportunity_Products__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data missing in Opportunity Products. Check again.
